channel.title: CVE Feed for MightyThemes -- Mighty Classic Pros And Cons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MightyThemes -- Mighty Classic Pros And Cons

item.title: CVE-2024-30556|2024-08-02T01:38:59.963Z -- mightythemes -- mighty%20classic%20pros%20and%20cons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MightyThemes Mighty Classic Pros And Cons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mighty Classic Pros And Cons: from n/a through 2.0.9.
